title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift. This exquisite set of candles is perfect for gifting to your loved ones including mothers, wives, daughters, and friends.

Experience the soothing scents of Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Blue bell, Wood sage & sea salt, Peony cherry blossom, and English pear & freesia. Each candle is carefully crafted with natural soy wax, ensuring a clean and eco-friendly burn. These candles are infused with essential oils, creating a relaxing and therapeutic ambiance.

Enjoy a burn time of 18-20 hours per candle, allowing you to indulge in these delightful fragrances for extended periods. The candles are encased in a convenient tin can, which not only adds a touch of elegance but also makes them portable and easy to carry. The tin cans are recyclable, promoting sustainability.

Please note, for safety reasons, it is important to keep the candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire.

Don't miss out on this wonderful gift set of 16 scented candles. Order now and create a serene and tranquil environment in your home or gift it to someone special.
